posts.post_content:
Anybody interested in trading T204's?  I have these 5 available and would like T204's back if possible:

J.Collins, Evers, Murray, Schaeffer, Donlin.

LMK,

Mac

No longer available
; sold at the show this weekend; 03/12/22.
Dean's Dugout Show, Naperville, IL.

My son sent me these pics of Archer, that he has.
We are both Cubbie fans and Donlin followers; Since Jimmy Collins spent some time up in Minne (my fam is all in the NW-WI area and the Cities); his stained one above, caught my eye as well.

I love the idea of good old fashioned trading from kid days.
Just ideas, Mac.

(P.S. - I am the fella that was talking T210-3 Doyle, Dallas with you a while back)

Ben
